premiumChannels.description: We offer over 50,000 TV channels, and the number of online channels grows every day. Nothing beats the streaming quality of our channels. IPTV SMARTERS PRO Subscription.

vodSeries.title: TV Series on VOD

antiFreezing.title: Anti-Freezing Technology
antiFreezing.description: Our services integrate advanced H.264 technology, which ensures efficient compression and optimal image quality. Thanks to this innovation, we offer a smooth streaming experience with Anti-Freezing Technology.

availability.title: 99.99% Availability
availability.description: We always strive to offer the best quality IPTV subscription service to our users. Maintaining a large number of TV channels and VOD content is not an easy task. Even so, we guarantee 99.99% availability on our streaming server. IPTV without interruptions.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods are available for our IPTV subscription?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept PayPal and debit/credit cards through a secure payment gateway with automatic currency conversion and no hidden fees.

twoDevices.question: Can I use two devices at the same time with a single IPTV subscription?
twoDevices.answer: Yes, you can watch on two screens simultaneously with the 2 connections offer through IPTV Smarters Pro or Smarters Lite Player.

bandwidth.question: How much bandwidth does IPTV streaming consume?
bandwidth.answer: Our IPTV streams use the latest H.264 technology, which offers the best compression and image quality. The average size of an IPTV stream is around 8 Mbps. However, when changing channels, the H.264 protocol can have a momentary peak to start displaying the image. For this reason, a minimum internet speed of 16 Mbps is required, and 30 Mbps is recommended for HD channels.

devicesSupported.question: What types of devices are supported?
devicesSupported.answer: An IPTV Smarters Pro subscription is compatible with various devices such as MAG, Android smartphones, Android boxes, Enigma, DreamBox, Vu+ (...), PC, VLC, Kodi/XBMC (...), Smart TV.

satellite.question: Do I need satellite to use IPTV?
satellite.answer: No satellite equipment or dish antenna is needed. Connection to Smarters Pro servers is made through the internet.

advantages.question: What are the advantages of IPTV?
advantages.answer: IPTV (Internet Protocol Television) offers several advantages. It represents a promising and highly profitable market that is valued by numerous telecommunications providers. In addition, IPTV allows the creation of new positive and profitable services that can generate additional revenue.

fundamentals.question: What are the fundamentals of the IPTV system?
fundamentals.answer: Two basic IPTV systems: content broadcast to multiple users simultaneously (live broadcast) or used for Video On Demand (VOD), where content is delivered individually to the subscriber who requested it. The system depends on a decoder (set-top box) and other essential components.

whatIsIptv.question: What is IPTV?
whatIsIptv.answer: IPTV is Internet Protocol Television, highlighting its impact, its origin from the use of the Internet Protocol, and its probable use in synchronization with telecommunications where broadband connections are widespread. Any service that provides data in packets can be used.

supportResponse.question: Response time for technical support tickets?
supportResponse.answer: When sending a ticket for account activation or technical support, you will receive a response within 30 minutes to 1 hour, with the goal of responding within the first hour. During peak hours, response time may extend up to 2 hours.

smartTvChannels.question: I downloaded the channel list, but the channels don't work on my Smart TV
smartTvChannels.answer: Please make sure your channel list works by testing it with IPTV Smarters Pro or another IPTV application on a PC. If it still doesn't work, don't hesitate to contact us via WhatsApp.

vlcSiptrv.question: Do channels work in the VLC player, but don't work in the SiPTV app?
vlcSiptrv.answer: If you have TVs with webOS or Tizen and your streams are multicast, you must enable the UDP to HTTP function in the app settings and configure it on your router. IPTV SMARTERS PRO Subscription

androidTvBox.question: Can an Android TV Box device convert my TV into a Smart TV?
androidTvBox.answer: The answer is yes. In fact, you will have access to all kinds of Google Play Store applications for Android. This turns your TV into an interactive device. You can use applications like Gmail, Firefox, Skype and many others directly from your TV. IPTV SMARTERS PRO Subscription

wifiEthernet.question: Wi-Fi or Ethernet?
wifiEthernet.answer: We always recommend connecting the device by cable (Ethernet).

androidTvBoxInstall.question: What is an Android TV Box and how to use it to install IPTV Smarters Pro?
androidTvBoxInstall.answer: An Android TV Box is an Android system device that converts your TV into a Smart TV, allowing you to install applications like IPTV Smarters Pro or Smarters Player Lite or ibo player. IPTV Smarters Pro Installation: 1. Connect the box to your TV and make sure it's connected to the internet. 2. Install IPTV Smarters Pro from Google Play Store. 3. Open the app, add a user and enter your IPTV credentials. 4. Enjoy streaming your IPTV channels! Install IPTV Smarters Pro or Smarters Player Lite (via Google Play Store) right now and start enjoying.

freeTrial.question: Do you offer a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes, we offer a 24-hour free trial that gives you full access to all channels, movies and series available in your IPTV subscription.

installation.title: IPTV Smarters Pro APK / Smarters Player Lite App Installation Guide
installation.subtitle: How to install IPTV Smarters Pro on your device
installation.description: Follow our simple installation guides to get started with IPTV on your preferred device.
installation.introTitle: Looking for a reliable app to watch live TV, movies, series, and channels from around the world?
installation.introDescription: Download IPTV Smarters Pro APK (2025) and turn your device into a true entertainment platform. This app is designed for users with an IPTV Subscription and offers a smooth and user-friendly streaming experience.
installation.whatIsDescription: IPTV Smarters is a media player application that allows users to stream IPTV content from their subscription provider. The app does not provide any content by itself, but it allows you to connect to your IPTV subscription via an Xtream Codes API, an M3U link, or a playlist file.
installation.whyChooseSubtitle: Here are some advantages that make IPTV Smarters one of the best IPTV applications in 2025:
installation.benefit1Description: Simple navigation for all user profiles.
installation.benefit2Description: Supports Xtream Codes credentials, M3U links, and local files.
installation.benefit3Description: Access to program schedules and show times.
installation.benefit4Description: Enjoy your channels in HD, Full HD or 4K depending on your subscription.
installation.benefit5Description: Watch different content on multiple devices simultaneously.
installation.benefit6Description: Secure access to children's content and resume where you left off.
